meanings.definition: In a cheerful and lively manner.
meanings.sent1: She skipped jollily down the street, humming a tune.
meanings.sent2: The children played jollily in the park on a sunny day.
meanings.sent3: The puppy wagged its tail jollily as it chased its own shadow.
meanings.sent4: The flowers bloomed jollily in the garden, adding color to the surroundings.
meanings.sent5: The old man laughed jollily, reminiscing about his youth.

meanings.definition: In a happy and carefree way.
meanings.sent1: The friends danced jollily at the party, without a care in the world.
meanings.sent2: The birds chirped jollily in the trees, enjoying the warm weather.
meanings.sent3: The cat stretched out jollily in the sun, soaking up the rays.
meanings.sent4: The stream flowed jollily through the meadow, reflecting the clear blue sky.
meanings.sent5: The baby giggled jollily, playing with its favorite toy.
